name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 仓秘书商品采集(速卖通/1688)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 仓秘书商品采集(速卖通/1688)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this plug-in, you can quickly collect commodity information from 1688 or Aliexpress. The operation method only needs to log in to the CMS ERP, and then find the commodity information you want to collect on 1688 or AliExpress. Click the collection button on the picture to complete the collection of commodity information
使用这款插件你可以从1688或者速卖通上快速采集商品的信息，操作方法只需要登录到仓秘书ERP，然后在1688或者速卖通上找到希望采集的商品信息，点击图片上的采集按钮就可以完成商品信息的采集了
